title: Queuer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Queue someone each day. They can't submit an action the next night. However, if they queued an action during the day, or otherwise indicated an action they would do the next night, that becomes their action. Also you learn their role, and it gets added to your queue.
- Use your queue at night. For the rest of the game, you can't use your first ability, and each night starting tonight, you must use the ability of the next role in your queue.
